original:
The regulation of trade and commerce, along with the resolution of business disputes, has significantly influenced the development of legal systems and courts throughout history. One of the earliest known legal codes, the Code of Hammurabi, dates back to approximately 1772 BC and includes provisions related to shipping costs and transactions between merchants and brokers.

The term "corporation" is derived from the Latin word
